about.details:
Incorporated in 2004, Gujarat based Indo US Bio-Tech Limited is engaged in the business of breeding products, processing and marketing of high performing open-pollinated and hybrid agricultural seed varieties & (seed testing, soil & water testing ). The company has its own laboratory for seed testing at Junagadh.

The company started In-House Research and Development (R&D) unit at Modasa, District - Sabarkantha (Gujarat) for research activities to produce better and different varieties of seeds. On September 23, 2011, it got the recognition up to March 31, 2014, for In-House R&D from Government of India, Ministry of Science and Technology, Department of Scientific and Industrial Research Technology Bhavan, New Delhi (DSIR).

In the initial stage, the company was engaged in producing different varieties of oilseeds and pulses seeds, later on, it also added vegetable, spices and cereals seeds to its basket. In the year 2014, it shifted its R&D unit Gandhinagar to carry on its research activities.

As on January 31, 2018, Indo US Bio-Tech has 45 Employees in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Indo US BioTech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Indo US BioTech IPO is a SME IPO of 1430000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.29 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on April 30, 2018, and closes on May 3, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Indo US BioTech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Indo US BioTech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Indo US BioTech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Indo US BioTech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Indo US BioTech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Indo US BioTech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Indo US BioTech IPO opens on April 30, 2018 and closes on May 3, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Indo US BioTech IPO?
faqs.answer: Indo US BioTech IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Indo US BioTech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Indo US BioTech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
